item.title: Organic Experience of Jennifer Park’s Wear Ever Jewelry
item.dc:creator: onewithclouds
item.description:
Designer of exclusive contemporary jewelry extraordinaire, Jennifer Jordan Park, is a true talent/mastermind behind the tasteful and exquisite Wear Ever Jewelry brand. The flowing, wavy lines of the brand’s designs add to an organic-like experience of her jewelry pieces. Such is the case with the incredible turquoise and royal blue basse-taille enamel necklace pictured above. The […]

The post Organic Experience of Jennifer Park’s Wear Ever Jewelry appeared first on Nuage Showroom.
item.content:encoded:
Designer of exclusive contemporary jewelry extraordinaire, Jennifer Jordan Park, is a true talent/mastermind behind the tasteful and exquisite Wear Ever Jewelry brand. The flowing, wavy lines of the brand’s designs add to an organic-like experience of her jewelry pieces. Such is the case with the incredible turquoise and royal blue basse-taille enamel necklace pictured above. The enamel pieces of the necklace are complemented with lapis and emerald gemstones. In line with Wear Ever Jewelry aesthetic, the base of the enamel is carefully prepared, while the silver the pieces are set in is brought to a beautiful contrasting finish, which in this case is matte. 

Contemporary Amuletic Jewelry Design and Inspiration

Interestingly, many items are intended by Jennifer as spiritual objects and amulets, aiming to comfort the wearer. Deeply fascinated by amuletic jewelry, Jeniffer kindly told us that many jewelry pieces can be considered protective or amuletic, if you truly believe that something about it protects You. Protective properties can be attributed to shape, color or content of a jewelry item. Pictured below, the ‘Chrisalis’ necklace is one of Wear Ever Jewelry’s most prominent amuletic jewelry pieces. In the words of Jennifer Park, herself: “The necklace depicts the chrysalis of the butterfly, which is a protective structure during that period of change from caterpillar to butterfly.” As to the inspiration behind these beautiful pieces, Jennifer adds: “a lot of nature’s creations, from gemstones to insects, make me think about how they can function as protective amulets.”

Educational Background and Professional Preferences

Jennifer Park received her Bachelor of Fine Arts degree from the University of Tennessee. Before conceiving Wear Ever Jewelry, Jennifer worked as a graphic print designer for about 20 years. Naturally, Jennifer also holds a Master of Arts Degree in studio art, namely jewelry and metals. Overall, Wear Ever Jewelry has been Jennifer’s predominant occupation for over 15 years . Having worked in the Middle East, Wear Ever Jewelry’s Jennifer Park developed a keen appreciation for gold and silver, which is why almost all of her designs are now exclusively set in sterling silver, as well as 18k or 22k gold. This can be seen in the magnificent ‘Chrysalis’ cloisonne enamel necklace above. Speaking of cloisonne jewelry, Jennifer is fascinated with traditional methods, which, among others, include enamel and granulation. All of this truly shows in her unconventional, yet beautiful, artistic and contemporary designs.

Jewelry Design Awards

Through Jennifer Park’s vision, experience and a refined taste, Wear Ever Jewelry creations are without a doubt unique pieces of handmade personal adornment. Each piece is made from gold, silver and gemstones. With these lasting materials, Wear Ever Jewelry items are created to be enjoyed for many years to come. No wonder, Wear Ever Jewelry designs are honored by numerous awards, including the Niche, Saul Bell and MJSA Vision awards. Take a look, for instance, at the ‘Guardian of the Empire’ necklace below which is a 2016 finalist in the enamel category of Saul Bell Design Awards. If you like what you see in this article, take a moment to reach out to Jennifer’s Wear Ever Jewelry through social networks, which you can easily find through her wonderful website. We, ourselves, just want to thank Jennifer for being such an inspiration!

All images courtesy of Wear Ever Jewelry.

The post Organic Experience of Jennifer Park’s Wear Ever Jewelry appeared first on Nuage Showroom.

item.title: Simplicity and Elegance in Przhonskaya SS16 Collection
item.dc:creator: onewithclouds
item.description:
We’re in awe of this beautiful piece from Przhonskaya’s SS16 collection. It is simple, elegant, beautifully conceived and shot. We borrowed this photo for our blog from Przhonsaya’s facebook page. You can learn more about this extraordinary designer through her Przhonskaya Designer Clothing Brand.

The post Simplicity and Elegance in Przhonskaya SS16 Collection appeared first on Nuage Showroom.

item.title: Nuria Carulla’s Timeless Contemporary Jewelry
item.dc:creator: onewithclouds
item.description:
Nuria Carulla is a truly spectacular and outstanding jeweler hailing from Colombia. Nuria’s unique vision and her extensive experience translate into amazing works of jewelry art. The unique thing about this art is that it feels timeless, just as much as it feels contemporary. We don’t want to say a whole lot about Nuria Carulla and her outstanding, absolutely incredible work. […]

The post Nuria Carulla’s Timeless Contemporary Jewelry appeared first on Nuage Showroom.
item.content:encoded:
Nuria Carulla is a truly spectacular and outstanding jeweler hailing from Colombia. Nuria’s unique vision and her extensive experience translate into amazing works of jewelry art. The unique thing about this art is that it feels timeless, just as much as it feels contemporary. We don’t want to say a whole lot about Nuria Carulla and her outstanding, absolutely incredible work. Really, the language of her jewelry pieces is much more universal. Let us just mention some of the most essential and the most interesting facts and tell-tale stories.

Personal Background and Professional Education

Nuria Carulla was born in Bogota, Colombia in 1951. Her family is originally from Barcelona, Spain, but had to move to Colombia for political reasons, as both her grandfather and her father, being Catalan, took active part in the independence movement. Nuria’s first visit to her homeland, Barcelona, Spain took place when she was 15. This trip was inspired by her grandfather who insisted that they take a boat in order for the family to see the magnitude of a distance between Bogota, Colombia’s capital, and Barcelona, the capital of Catalonia, a region located in northeastern Spain. Upon arrival, Nuria was absolutely surprised to discover that Catalan is not the language that is almost elusively used within her family, but is instead widely spoken. It is here in Barcelona that Nuria Carulla undertakes her first studies in jewelry craft at the Massana School (1966-1970). Gemology studies at the Geological and Mining Institute of Spain ensue (1968-1970), along with mastering engraving at the University of Los Andes, Bogota (1971-1972).

Nuria Carulla’s Art Gallery Exhibitions

Since then, Nuria Carulla has held a countless number of her own exhibitions at a various galleries, including Gallery Eucaliptus, Gallery Escala, Gallery Garces Velaquez, Gallery Deimos, as well as partaking in such exhibitions as ‘Alea Colombian Jewelry’, Spain, ‘Interntional Shipo Expo’, Japan. Nuria Carulla has also held many jobs as a teacher and a professor, helping countless young men and women master the art and craft of jewelry. Her work has received recognition through a number of national and international awards and it’s easy to see why.

Participation in Jewelry Workshops and Personal Views

Nuria Carulla is an influential figure in Colombian jewelry and art, having among others, curated a program aimed at helping Colombian artisans reach international markets through numerous practical workshops around the country. In her interviews, Nuria Carulla loves to reiterate that jewelry is a lot like a communication gesture by which we get to say who are, what we think and what we like. Despite her professional accomplishments, Nuria Carulla remains humble and says that we shouldn’t believe ourselves to have all of the wisdom, but instead we should work together and learning from each other. What an inspirational figure!
 Images courtesy of Nuria Carulla’s Jewelry Facebook Page.

The post Nuria Carulla’s Timeless Contemporary Jewelry appeared first on Nuage Showroom.
